name: chairclicker
description:
Simple chair clicker.
Push the chair to the left or right, and get points.

chair rotates when you click (Touch/Mouse/Keyboard) on the "left" or "right" buttons

"plus" button (or key "M") opens Upgrade Menu where three options:
• "luck level", increase the probability, duration and bonus points for "luck" mode
• "speed level", increase the speed of rotation of the chair, which increases the bonus points
• "click level", increasing the bonus for each click
